title: Men of War II - Frontline Hero Edition
description: Men of War II, the anticipated sequel to the highly acclaimed RTS franchise is here with all-new units, locations, campaigns, game modes and true trademarks of the series: historical fidelity and action-filled gameplay on the Eastern and Western Fronts of WWII.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Limited time offer! Purchase Men of War II now and get the Frontline Hero Pack for free!
<!--text-->
---

<!--image-->
![Men of War II-1e8o7](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/26c17b7ea30743cab31561fba4f21547/men-of-war-ii-1e8o7.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Experience World War II real-time strategy gameplay like never before! Men of War II, the new chapter in the evolution of the top-rated RTS franchise, brings you an unprecedented number of units with different specializations to command, unyielding attention to historical fidelity, new levels of visual and audio excellence, as well as advanced enemy AI. Lead your troops in intense real-time battles on the Western and Eastern Fronts and overwhelm your opponents in epic narrative single-player campaigns and skirmish modes before diving deep into the multiplayer action.

Utilize sophisticated military strategies, lay ambushes, capture enemy vehicles or weapons, and show your ability as the greatest military leader of all time. Attain full command of different roles: from Artillery and Armor to Infantry and Support. Blast entire buildings to smithereens or construct fortifications to reshape the battlefield - from trenches and dugouts to bunkers and minefields. Use the Direct Control feature to precisely manage any single unit on the field at any time. Dive deep into classical combat mechanics combined with all-new gameplay features and experience the intensity of one of the longest-running series of WWII games in an exciting new way.

Men of War II also boasts a staggering breadth of gameplay options: whether you prefer a realistic take on World War II strategy typical for previous entries in the franchise or enjoy a more casual experience; the captivating stories of narrative campaigns or experimenting with different tactics in ever-changing dynamic modes; challenging other commanders in ranked matches or customizing every detail of each battle in a lobby, Men of War II offers an astounding amount of content to sate your thirst for battle.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Purchase the game now until May 22, 2024 and get The Frontline Hero Pack for free – a must for any true fan of Men of War II, as it grants the following perks:

- 2 exclusive profile badges and 6 exclusive avatars to show off your Hero status
- Immediately unlock* 4 collectible tank units to intimidate your foes in multiplayer matches
- 10 wallpapers featuring beautiful art from the game, to spruce up your desktop

**all units are available for unlocking via in-game actions as well.*

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# FEATURES:
<!--text-->
---

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# A Cinematic Single-Player Experience
<!--text-->
Experience epic stories told in three narrative campaigns — lead the desperate Soviet defense against the initial brutal onslaught on the Eastern Front; become a US commander in Normandy, having to improvise with limited resources and adapt to unfamiliar ground, in order to overcome the Nazi war machine; or step into the shoes of an old, disillusioned Wehrmacht officer on the retreat to Berlin, inadvertently delaying the defeat of the regime he himself hates.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Historical and Dynamic Campaigns
<!--text-->
Enjoy a more open experience as you take on Historical Campaigns inspired by the Soviet Operation Bagration and the US Operation Overlord with customizable battalion setups and strategies, or the endless possibilities of the fully dynamic Conquest campaign and the skirmish-like Raids, where no two playthroughs are ever the same.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Intense Multiplayer Combat in PvP and Co-op Modes
<!--text-->
Jump into the biggest and most varied multiplayer mode in franchise history and challenge other players in clashes ranging from 1v1 to 5v5; command a specialized Battalion and find the right synergy with your team-mates; take a more generalist approach with Combined Arms or lead all your nation’s units in the Classic Mode, resembling the Men of War: Assault Squad 2 experience. Take competition to the next level in Match-making and Leagues, tweak a wide range of options in custom Lobbies, or play any part of the single-player content in co-op with up to 4 other players.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Varied and Historically Accurate Units
<!--text-->
From nigh-indestructible tanks, devastating artillery, and nimble airplanes to realistic models of infantry armament and military equipment, Men of War II features the most extensive and highly detailed WWII locations, vehicles, and characters roster in the series to date: three armies, 45 customizable battalions, and close to 400 different units await your commands.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Stunning Visuals and Captivating Sound Design
<!--text-->
Experience the classical theater of war from a new perspective: every location comes to life with a unique set of fully destructible objects, realistic physics, and immersive sound design. Men of War II takes audio-visual excellence to a new level for the series, with native support for up to 4K resolution and ultra-wide, 21:9 aspect ratio, Physically Based Rendering, and other enhancements. At the same time, the game’s engine takes full advantage of 64-bit, multithreading processing to ensure the best possible optimization and smooth experience even on lower-spec PCs.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Deeply Customizable, Yet Easily Accessible Gameplay
<!--text-->
Veterans of the series will enjoy the myriad of detailed settings and tweaks available to create a gameplay experience tailored exactly to their liking, with options ranging from turning various UI elements on or off, to the amount of Command Points and Manpower resource available in a match; while others will appreciate the possibility to just jump into a quick match-making battle or use a pre-set roster of units in a mission with no hassle.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Full Mod Support
<!--text-->
Create and share your own war scenarios using a special level design and modding toolset for Men of War II. Now the choices are up to you: your creativity; your vision; your skills. The tactical possibilities are endless.
